prompt: I have an audio file and need to know which app or AI tool can transcribe it.

hidden_queries: apps or AI tools to transcribe audio file
best transcription tools AI audio to text transcription services
metadata.generated_search_query: apps or AI tools to transcribe audio file

sources.title: 9 Best AI Transcription Tools for 2025 (17 Reviewed)
sources.snippet: Conclusion In conclusion, AI transcription tools have come a long way in recent years, offering users accurate, affordable, and efficient solutions for converting audio and video files into text. By choosing the right tool that meets your specific needs and preferences, you can save time, effort, and resources in the transcription process.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are reliable apps and AI tools you can use to transcribe your audio file into text: Easy, user-friendly options Otter.ai – Web/mobile tool for uploading audio files and getting AI transcripts; good accuracy and editing features. Useful AI

sources.title: 9 Best AI Transcription Tools for 2025 (17 Reviewed)
sources.snippet: Conclusion In conclusion, AI transcription tools have come a long way in recent years, offering users accurate, affordable, and efficient solutions for converting audio and video files into text. By choosing the right tool that meets your specific needs and preferences, you can save time, effort, and resources in the transcription process.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Trint – Good for journalists/teams with collaboration and editing tools. Useful AI
TurboScribe – App/online service for uploading audio and getting transcripts in many languages. TurboScribe
Free or built-in alternatives Google Gemini (app/website) – Upload short audio files (e.g., up to ~10 minutes) and transcribe for free, plus summary/cleanup prompts. Tom's Guide
Otter free tier – Some free monthly minutes for uploads. Maestra AI
If you want more control (desktop/advanced) Descript – Combines transcription with audio/video editing. Sonix
ELAN (free software) – Manual or semi-automatic annotation/transcription for research workflows. Wikipedia

sources.title: 9 Best AI Transcription Tools for 2025 (17 Reviewed)
sources.snippet: Conclusion In conclusion, AI transcription tools have come a long way in recent years, offering users accurate, affordable, and efficient solutions for converting audio and video files into text. By choosing the right tool that meets your specific needs and preferences, you can save time, effort, and resources in the transcription process.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Key points to consider Accuracy depends heavily on audio quality, accents, noise, and number of speakers. Useful AI
Most AI tools let you upload common audio formats (MP3, WAV). Maestra AI
